nodes.text: Te Hasa was a location in the Gree Enclave region of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. The pirate queen Maz Kanata marked Te Hasa as a site of interest on a map she included in the book that became known as the Smuggler's Guide.

Te Hasa was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 replica journal book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, written by Daniel Wallace. Te Hasa was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in "The Gree Enclave," an article written by Timothy S. O'Brien and published in the 1995 West End Games' Star Wars Adventure Journal 8.
